DataElement.preferredName: Plan Maintenance Therapy Post Date Last Form Protocol Administration Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not planned maintenance therapy was administered per protocol since the date of the last report.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Plan Maintenance Therapy Post Date Last Form Protocol Administration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: To devise, contrive, or formed in design._Treatment that is given to help a primary (original) treatment keep working. Maintenance therapy is often given to help keep cancer in remission._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen._Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._A printed or electronic document with spaces to be filled out._A rule which guides how an activity should be performed._The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Planned; devised, contrived, or formed in design.:Treatment that is given to help a primary (original) treatment keep working. Maintenance therapy is often given to help keep cancer in remission.

Concepts.definition: To devise, contrive, or form in design.
Continuation of treatment for an extended period of time to prevent relapse.

Property.preferredName: Post Date Last Form Protocol Administration
Property.preferredDefinition: Post; occuring after.:a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.:Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:A printed or electronic document with spaces to be filled out.:A protocol is a rule which guides how an activity should be performed; a set of formal rules used to specify the format of an exchange of data.:The act of administration.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
A printed or electronic document with spaces to be filled out.
A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.
The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unk ND NA Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes, no, unknown, not done or not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Done Not Applicable Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.:Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or completed.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
